name: Squish-a-bro
description:
SQUISH-A-BRO! A battle game for 2 players in which you jump on your opponent's head to squish them! Once a player reduces their opponents lives to zero, the battle is ended and the surviving player is crowned the winner.

It's in development at the moment and the maps are pretty experimental to see what's fun. All feedback is welcome!

Local multiplayer only.

Requires 2 gamepads
Any problems try downloading for Windows instead.
